items.title: Trade Spotlight: How should you trade Voltas, Sonata Software, Piramal Enterprises, Tata Motors, Redington, Coromandel, Eternal and others on July 15?
items.description: The market may see further consolidation with a negative bias if it breaks Monday’s low in the upcoming sessions. Below are some short-term trading ideas to consider.

items.title: Travel Food Services shares close lower on market debut, valued at Rs 14,158 crore
items.description: Travel Food Services shares are valued at Rs 14,158 crore at close on Monday.

items.title: Sun Pharma settles patent litigation with Incyte, paving way for launch of anti-baldness drug LEQSELVI
items.description: As part of the agreement, Incyte has granted Sun Pharma a limited, non-exclusive license to US Patent Nos. 9,662,335 and other related patents.

items.title: Gainers & Losers: Top 10 stocks that moved the most on July 14
items.description: Broader markets outperformed benchmarks, with Nifty Smallcap and Nifty Midcap indices rising over 1% and 0.70% respectively

items.title: Taking Stock: Nifty extends fall for a fourth day but holds above 25,000, mid and smallcap indices end higher
items.description: Broader indices unperformed the main indices, with BSE Mid and Smallcap indices rising 0.5 percent each.

items.title: Asian Paints, HPCL, Apollo Tyres, other crude-sensitive stocks fall up to 1.5% as Brent rises above $71 per barrel
items.description: Crude oil prices climbed as markets awaited a 'major announcement' from US President Donald Trump related to Russia.

items.title: Sambhv Steel board to consider audited results
items.description: It is important to note that the last value for Sambhv Steel stood at Rs 118.75, reflecting a decrease of 4.89%.

items.title: R R Kabel Announces Final Dividend of ₹3.50, Ex-Date Due Today
items.description: Ratios from last three years: EPS(₹): Mar 2025 - 27.40, Mar 2024 - 26.52, Mar 2023 - 17.01; Book Value(₹): Mar 2025 - 189.96, Mar 2024 - 161.70, Mar 2023 - 104.63.

items.title: Persistent announces Rs 15 dividend, ex-date due today
items.description: With the stock's last traded price at ₹5,612.50, investors will be closely watching the market reaction to the ex-date and the overall impact of the dividend on the stock's performance.

items.title: DMR Hydroengine to consider final dividend and bonus issue
items.description: Investors will be closely watching the board meeting's outcome, as the final dividend and bonus issue decisions could significantly impact shareholder value and market sentiment.

items.title: Ola Electric stock jumps 19.3% following June quarter results
items.description: The company's last traded price reflects a significant increase compared to its previous day's closing, driven by investor sentiment surrounding the quarterly results announcement, with quarterly results due today.

items.title: Nifty Clutches On To 25,000 Amid Tariff, Earnings Blues| Ola Electric In Top Gear| Closing Bell Live
items.description: Nifty clutches on to 25,000 as week starts on a subdued note. Broaders markets defy trend; smallcap index up over 1%. Realty, Pharma, PSU Banks, Autos Trade With Gains. IT Extends Losses; Top Sectoral Laggard. NSE advance-decline ratio at 1:1; India VIX Up 1.5%. Join Nandita Khemka and Yatin Mota as they break down the week’s market action and highlight stocks to watch.

items.title: Sri Adhikari to hold EGM; ex-date due today
items.description: The balance sheet data indicates that share capital has remained relatively stable.

items.title: Syngene International shares gain 1.64% amid volume surge
items.description: Syngene International shares experienced a 1.64% increase, reaching Rs 636.45 in Monday's session.

items.title: PB Fintech shares rise 2.07% on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: The company's revenue for the quarter-ending March 2025 stood at Rs 1,507.87 Crore, which is an increase compared to Rs 1,291.62 Crore in December 2024

items.title: Info Edge India shares rise 2.01%; stock among top gainers on Nifty Next 50
items.description: As of March 2025, key financial ratios for Info Edge India include a P/E ratio of 96.52, a P/B ratio of 13.30, and an EV/EBITDA of 226.30. The company's debt-to-equity ratio remained at 0.00 for the year-ending March 2025.

items.title: Sell Tata Elxsi; target of Rs 4965: Deven Choksey
items.description: Deven Choksey is bearish on Tata Elxsi has recommended sell rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 4965 in its research report dated July 14, 2025.

items.title: Ashok Leyland shares jump 2.38% amid high volume; stock among top gainers on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: Ashok Leyland announced a bonus issue with a record date of July 16, 2025, offering a 1:1 bonus ratio

items.title: HDFC Life Q1 Preview: Double-digit APE growth likely, margins to expand as product mix shifts
items.description: HDFC Life is expected to report robust double-digit growth in both annual premium equivalent and value of new business in Q1FY26, with strong premium momentum, improved margins, and receding regulatory concerns providing a supportive backdrop.

items.title: Defence stocks extend losses to third day on profit-booking; GRSE, Cochin Shipyard, BDL fall up to 4%
items.description: The defence stocks saw significant rally earlier this year, but analysts now flag high valuations.

items.title: Cochin Shipyard, AU Small Finance Bank among top losers on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: SBI Card and GE Vernova TD also featured among the top losers, with declines of 2.75% and 2.38% respectively

items.title: Should minority shareholders of VIP bite the open offer bait?
items.description: The deal value of the stake sale agreement is at a 15 percent discount to Friday’s closing price

items.title: Hitachi Energy India shares rise marginally amid volume surge
items.description: With the stock currently trading at Rs 18,605, Hitachi Energy India has shown a marginal gain of 0.19% amid volume surge.

items.title: Wipro, Tech Mahindra, Infosys among top losers on Nifty 50
items.description: The annual revenue for Wipro has seen fluctuations, peaking at Rs 90,487.60 Crore in 2023 before slightly decreasing to Rs 89,088.40 Crore in 2025.
